org.cryptacular.generator

Class KeyPairGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cryptacular.generator.KeyPairGenerator

  • public final class KeyPairGenerator
extends Object
    Static factory that generates various types of asymmetric key pairs.
    Author:
    Middleware Services

    • Method Summary

      Generates a DSA key pair.

    • Method Detail

      • generateDSA

        public static KeyPair generateDSA(SecureRandom random,
                                  int bitLength)
        Generates a DSA key pair.
        Parameters:
        random - Random source required for key generation.
        bitLength - Desired key size in bits.
        Returns:
        DSA key pair of desired size.

      • generateRSA

        Parameters:

        bitLength - Desired key size in bits.
        Returns:

      • generateEC

        public static KeyPair generateEC(SecureRandom random,
                                 int bitLength)
        Generates a EC key pair.
        Parameters:
        random - Random source required for key generation.
        bitLength - Desired key size in bits.
        Returns:

      • generateEC

        public static KeyPair generateEC(SecureRandom random,
                                 String namedCurve)
        Generates a EC key pair.
        Parameters:
        random - Random source required for key generation.
        namedCurve - Well-known elliptic curve name that includes domain parameters including key size.
        Returns:
        EC key pair according to named curve.
